Uses of Package
org.xbmc.httpapi.client

  • Packages that use org.xbmc.httpapi.client 
    Package Description
    org.xbmc.httpapi  
    org.xbmc.httpapi.client  
  • Classes in org.xbmc.httpapi.client used by org.xbmc.httpapi 
    Class and Description
    ControlClient
    The ControlClient class takes care of everything related to controlling XBMC.
    InfoClient
    The InfoClient basically takes care of everything else not covered by the other clients (music, video and control).
    MusicClient
    Takes care of every music related stuff, notably the music database.
    TvShowClient
    TV show client for HTTP API.
    VideoClient
    Takes care of everything related to the video database.
  • Classes in org.xbmc.httpapi.client used by org.xbmc.httpapi.client 
    Class and Description
    Client
    Abstract super class of all (media) clients.
